access: Member of the Pathfinder Society on a mission for the Arcadian Mariner’s Lodge.
markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Weapon 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Combat Grapnel](/Weapons.aspx?ID=139)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Finesse" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=179" />
<trait label="Grapple" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=184" />
<trait label="Tethered" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=252" />
<trait label="Thrown 20 ft." url="/Traits.aspx?ID=195" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [PFS Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=50) pg. 80</row>

_[**PFS Note**](/pathfinder-society) Characters from the High Seas have access to the combat grapnel_

**Access** Member of the Pathfinder Society on a mission for the Arcadian Mariner’s Lodge.

<row gap="medium">
**Price** 9 sp

**Damage** 1d6 P

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Hands** 2

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Category** Martial

**Group** [Flail](/WeaponGroups.aspx?ID=7)
</row>

</column>

---

Although [grappling hooks](/Equipment.aspx?ID=23) typically serve as a climbing tool, this specially reinforced grapnel attached to a rope up to 10 feet long can be swung as a weapon. This is a martial melee weapon.

<title level="2">Critical Specialization Effects</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 283 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

Certain feats, class features, weapon runes, and other effects can grant you additional benefits when you make a Strike with certain weapons and get a critical success. This is called a critical specialization effect. The exact effect depends on which weapon group your weapon belongs to, as listed below. You can always decide not to add the critical specialization effect of your weapon.

[Click here for the full rules on Critical Specialization Effects](/Rules.aspx?ID=235).

<document level="2" id="weapon-group-7" />

<title level="2">Specific Magic Weapons</title>
[Tidal Fishhook](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1485)
